attributes.action: Save thousands of jobs by making Airbus invest in developing new wing technology in Broughton.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Airbus site at Broughton is a center of wing building excellence that employs many thousands of people.

Airbus are not going to use this site for future composite wings, instead new technology will be developed in other countries. This will be a huge threat to the site and thousands of jobs.

If it closes the local economy will be devastated as there is little other skilled employment.  

WE NEED TO INVEST IN THE LATEST TECHNOLOGY IN THE UK TO KEEP OUR JOBS.
